{{disambig-two|the magazine|[[Warning beacons of Gondor|beacon]] of [[Gondor]]|[[Amon Dîn]]}}
'''''Amon Dîn''''' was a magazine published by the The Tolkien Society of Treewood ([[Wikipedia:Englewood, Colorado|Englewood, Colorado]]). 9 issues were published.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=AmonDinFanzine|articlename=Amon Dîn|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=7 January 2012}}</ref>
